revised_title: Optical Rotatory Power of Vapours: Rotatory Dispersion of Camphor and Camphorquinone
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to measure the optical rotatory power of camphor and camphorquinone vapours. They discovered a complex anomaly in the region of the ketonic absorption band at 2900 A.U., which they explained through the study of circular dichroism. This research provided a deeper understanding of the rotatory dispersion of these compounds in vapour form.
